alert.note: Alert for Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 1:53PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of western Massachusetts, including the following county, Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 500 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 152 PM EDT, gauge reports on the Mill River indicated heavy rain due to heavy rainfall. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Northampton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
